# totalSize

**Instance Property**

The total size of the message.

## Declaration

```swift
var totalSize: Measurement<UnitInformationStorage> { get }
```

## Discussion

If this value exceeds `MMSConfiguration/maximumMessageSize`, sending the message with [doc://com.apple.availability/documentation/TelephonyMessagingKit/MMSService/sendMessage(_:)] fails with [doc://com.apple.availability/documentation/TelephonyMessagingKit/MMSService/Error/maximumSizeExceeded].

## Accessing message properties

- **cellularServiceID**: The cellular service identifier associated with the message.
- **CellularServiceID**: An opaque identifier that represents the cellular service for which to provide operations.
- **messageID**: A message identifier for the message.
- **MMSMessageID**: A structure that represents an MMS message identifier.
- **description**: A textual representation of the message.
